channel.title: Menu Help? nub question
channel.description:
I know this is a noob question, but i have a menu created, how can i make a command that opens that certain menu?
Like ::commands and it will open the correct menu? Thanks

item.title: Menu Help? nub question
item.dc:creator: @99str3ngth99 99str3ngth99
item.description:
@99str3ngth99 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@dre@d d s p 3 c commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“commands”, 8146);
sendQuest("::banuser", 8147);
sendQuest("::skills , ::master", 8148);
sendQuest("::skillcapes", 8149);
sendQuest(“ONLY FOR SILAB CLIENT”, 8150);
sendQuest("::bp,::bp2,::bp3,::bp4", 8151);

           sendQuestSomething(8143);
           showInterface(8134);
           flushOutStream();

}

thats it just change the send quest to what u want it to say

Read full topic
